name: ARMOutputParserExtension
friendlyName: Azure Resource Manager deployment output parser
description: Convert ARM template deployment output to Azure DevOps pipeline variables version 0.0.2
author: Rasmus WÃ¤tjen

inputs.name: armOutputVariableName
inputs.label: ARM Deployment Output variable name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The variable name (without $, just the name) entered into the "Deployment Outputs" field in the Azure Resource Group Deployment task.

inputs.name: variablePrefix
inputs.label: Prefix all ARM output names with
inputs.helpMarkDown: ARM template outputs will be prefixed with this string

inputs.name: ExcludedOutputs
inputs.label: Comma separated list of outputs to exclude
inputs.helpMarkDown: These ARM output names will not be converted to pipeline variables
